summary:
Simply adds a Master level alteration spell that applies the effects of Dragon aspect to you!

REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC
descriptionHtml:
Simply adds a Master level alteration spell that applies the effects of Dragon aspect to you!

------>REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC<------

You can find the tome on a bookshelf in farengar's room in dragonsreach. Watch the video or see photos for the location lol.
author: Nucspike
